CHAT.comment: Home Visit 4 , MOT and CHI sitting at kitchen table , BRO watching
Book Reading 1; The Very Hungry Caterpillar
Chi an okay reader; Mot corrects when Chi stumbles and once says to sound out; Bro a distraction

u.a: when they saw Hungry Caterpillar , MOT assumed that she would be reading , like at the other visits
MOT turns the book to the first page with the story
lay on a leaf said very deliberately
BRO talking a bit , says pears ?
points to words , where to start
